Best places to eat in Reykjavík, Iceland

31 January 2019

Reykjavík, Iceland

Best places to eat in Reykjavík!

For all my foodies out there, this one’s for you! Now that you’ve read my 3 day Reykjavík, Iceland itinerary it’s time to discuss where to eat in Iceland!

I’m going to make this short & simple:

Bakeries/Ice Cream:

  • Brauð & Co.
  • Valdis

Cafes:

  • The Coocoo's Nest
  • Bergsson Mathús
  • Sandholt

Restaurants:

  • La Primavera Ristorante
  • Bryggjan Brugghús
  • Messinn
  • Þrír Frakkar
  • Skál!
  • Reykjavík Chips

Street food:

  • Bæjarins Beztu Pylsur

I will add to this list over time, so be sure to check back!
